author: pbs.org
title: All NATO members projected to hit old spending target, with just three set to meet new goal
description: The increase in spending reflects security concerns from Russia's war in Ukraine and pressure from U.S. President Donald Trump.
content:
The increase in spending reflects security concerns from Russia's war in Ukraine and pressure from U.S. President Donald Trump.
